Features.title: Geo Tagged Colleges
Features.text: 3 Step process for colleges to get geo-tagged securely and for users to spot them on map

Features.title: College Profile
Features.text: Get all the college aggregated data under the college profile page on Shikshaverse

Features.title: Advanced Help Desk
Features.text: Advanced Help Desk is set up for each college for smoother communication

Features.title: 3D Views
Features.text: 3D views of Colleges which covers both interior and exterior
